subGroups.title: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.RI.6-8
subGroups.name: Argumentation
subGroups.description: Trace and evaluate the argument and specific claims in a text, distinguishing claims that are supported by reasons and evidence from claims that are not.

achievements.title: Legal Intern
achievements.info: Student makes at least 1 correct objection within a single case.

achievements.title: Law Clerk
achievements.info: Student has selected only relevant evidence within a single case.

achievements.title: Associate Attorney
achievements.info: Student correctly completes the reasoning wheel 2 times within a single case.

achievements.title: Lead Attorney
achievements.info: Student has selected relevant Supreme Court or Constitution support at least 2 times within the first 3 turns within a single case.
